p: The globally accepted minimum target number of CD34+ cells for auto-HSCT of ≥2 × 10 6 cells/kg was achieved in similar proportions of patients in both treatment arms: FD group, 28 of 30 patients (93.3%); WB group, 28 of 31 patients (90.3%) (Supplementary Table S 1). The median time to reach the target of ≥5 × 10 6 CD34 + cells/kg was 3 days in both treatment groups, and the median time to reach ≥2 × 10 6 CD34 + cells/kg was 1 day in the FD group and 2 days in the WB group.
